That was very clear Margaret!
   
  What Ghost box do you have?
   
  Mike Edwards Cary NC

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
          
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Margaret Downey/Radio Sweep - Manual/ArthurTheTech.mp3 
Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
Description : I've been a little leery about the new tech, Arthur from EVP Maker, so I wanted to see what my trusted tech tech team had to say about him. In the clip I ask, "Whose Arthur?" and they reply, "ARTHUR THE TECH. DESCENT PEOPLE. - HE'S PICKED YOU FROM TECH DAVID. - DAVID HERE." This is a raw clip with the exception of my having removed sweep from between the phrases as indicated by the dashes. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/Radio%20Sweep%20-%20Manual/ArthurTheTech.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>




                           

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
